code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import Modal from"./modal/Modal";import ModalBody from"./modal/ModalBody";import ModalFooter from"./modal/ModalFooter";import ModalHeader from"./modal/ModalHeader";import ModalTitle from"./modal/ModalTitle";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var SetWordModal=function SetWordModal(props){var handleSubmit=function handleSubmit(e){e.preventDefault();props.setWord(props.word.toUpperCase());props.onClose();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Modal,{show:props.show,onClose:props.onClose,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalHeader,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ModalTitle,{children:"Multiplayer"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ModalBody,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{htmlFor:"word",children:"Please enter a word:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{className:"form-control form-control-sm",type:"text",name:"word",onChange:function onChange(e){return props.setWord(e.target.value);},required:true})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(ModalFooter,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button",type:"submit",children:"Play"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"button-2",children:"Back to Home"})})]})]})]});};export default SetWordModal;
